cards.title: After School Club
cards.description: After School Club, often shortened to ASC, is a South Korean internet-based live-music request television talk show co-hosted by Park Jimin, Seungmin and Heejun.

cards.title: Big Stage
cards.description: New singing program from Astro.

cards.title: I Can See Your Voice (Malaysia)
cards.description: A local spin-off version from Korea's famous variety show.

cards.title: Music Bank
cards.description: Music Bank is a South Korean music program which airs every Friday at 17:00 KST on KBS2.

cards.title: The Return of Superman
cards.description: The Return of Superman is a South Korean reality-variety show that airs on KBS2.

cards.title: Gundam Build Fighters
cards.description: Gundam Build Fighters is a 2013 Japanese science fiction anime television series based on Sunrise's long-running Gundam franchise.

cards.title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED
cards.description: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED is an anime series developed by Sunrise and directed by Mitsuo Fukuda.

cards.title: Mr Bean the Animated Series
cards.description: Following the animated adventures of the clueless yet brilliant Mr Bean and his faithful sidekick Teddy.

cards.title: Tom & Jerry
cards.description: Centers on a rivalry between its two title characters, Tom, a cat, and Jerry, a mouse.

cards.title: Upin & Ipin
cards.description: Curious and fun-loving 5-year-old twin brothers Upin and Ipin learn and explore new things.

cards.title: Al Jazeera News
cards.description: Al Jazeera, also known as JSC, is a state-funded broadcaster in Doha, Qatar, owned by the Al Jazeera Media Network.

cards.title: Arirang News
cards.description: Arirang TV is a global, English-language television network based in Seoul, South Korea.

cards.title: Buletin Awani
cards.description: Astro Awani is the in-house rolling television news and current affairs channel providing 24-hour news coverage including news in Malay.

cards.title: Euronews
cards.description: PurchasedEuronews is a multilingual news media service, headquartered in Lyon, France.

cards.title: KBS News
cards.description: KBS Nine O'Clock News is the flagship newscast that airs on KBS1 every night at 9:00pm KST.

cards.title: 2018 All England Open
cards.description: The 2018 All England Open, officially YONEX All England Open 2018 was a badminton tournament which took place at Arena Birmingham in England from 14 to 18 March 2018 and had a total purse of $1,000,000.

cards.title: 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup Qualifiers
cards.description: Process to determine the teams that will participate at the 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup.

cards.title: Asian Netball Championships 2018
cards.description: The Asian Netball Championship is a netball competition held every two years with teams from across Asia competing.

cards.title: Best Shot
cards.description: 'Best Shot,' a documentary series co-produced by Lebron James about an inner city basketball team, is available on the NBA YouTube channel.

cards.title: Chelsea Films
cards.description: Get to know Chelsea like no one ever did before.
